trans-unit.source: /doc | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: /doc |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: /doc
trans-unit.target: /doc

trans-unit.source: Processes documentation comments to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 將文件註解處理成 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Arguments
trans-unit.target: 引數

trans-unit.source: Term
trans-unit.target: 詞彙

trans-unit.source: Definition
trans-unit.target: 定義

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇項。

trans-unit.source: Specifying +, or just `/doc`, causes the compiler to generate documentation information and place it in an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 +，或只是`/doc`，會使編譯器產生文件資訊，並將它放在 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Specifying `-` is the equivalent of not specifying `/doc`, causing no documentation information to be created.
trans-unit.target: 指定`-`相當於未指定`/doc`，造成要建立文件資訊。

trans-unit.source: Required if `/doc:` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 `/doc:`，則為必要項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the output XML file, which is populated with the comments from the source-code files of the compilation.
trans-unit.target: 指定輸出 XML 檔案，它會填入從編譯的原始程式檔的註解。

trans-unit.source: If the file name contains a space, surround the name with quotation marks (" ").
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案名稱包含空格，請用的名稱加上引號 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: 備註

trans-unit.source: The `/doc` option controls whether the compiler generates an XML file containing the documentation comments.
trans-unit.target: `/doc`選項會控制是否編譯器會產生包含文件註解的 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you use the `/doc:``file` syntax, the `file` parameter specifies the name of the XML file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`/doc:``file`語法，`file`參數會指定 XML 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you use `/doc` or `/doc+`, the compiler takes the XML file name from the executable file or library that the compiler is creating.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`/doc`或`/doc+`，編譯器會從可執行檔或程式庫編譯器建立的 XML 檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you use `/doc-` or do not specify the `/doc` option, the compiler does not create an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`/doc-`或不指定`/doc`選項，編譯器不會建立 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: In source-code files, documentation comments can precede the following definitions:
trans-unit.target: 在原始程式檔中，文件註解可以在下列定義之前︰

trans-unit.source: User-defined types, such as a [class](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/class-statement.md) or [interface](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/interface-statement.md)
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義型別，例如[類別](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/class-statement.md)或[介面](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/interface-statement.md)

trans-unit.source: Members, such as a field, [event](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/event-statement.md), [property](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/property-statement.md), [function](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/function-statement.md), or [subroutine](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/sub-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 成員，例如欄位、[事件](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/event-statement.md)，[屬性](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/property-statement.md)，[函式](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/function-statement.md)，或[副程式](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/sub-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: To use the generated XML file with the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../csharp/includes/vsprvs_md.md)] [IntelliSense](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/using-intellisense) feature, let the file name of the XML file be the same as the assembly you want to support.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用產生的 XML 檔案，與[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../csharp/includes/vsprvs_md.md)] [IntelliSense](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/using-intellisense)功能，可讓您想要支援的組件相同的 XML 檔案的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the XML file is in the same directory as the assembly so that when the assembly is referenced in the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../csharp/includes/vsprvs_md.md)] project, the .xml file is found as well.
trans-unit.target: 請確定 XML 檔案是組件相同目錄中，讓組件中的參考時[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../csharp/includes/vsprvs_md.md)]專案中的.xml 檔案也找到。

trans-unit.source: XML documentation files are not required for IntelliSense to work for code within a project or within projects referenced by a project.
trans-unit.target: XML 文件檔案不是要讓 IntelliSense 在專案或專案所參考之專案中的程式碼的運作必要的。

trans-unit.source: Unless you compile with `/target:module`, the XML file contains the tags `<assembly></assembly>`.
trans-unit.target: 除非您使用編譯`/target:module`，XML 檔案包含標記`<assembly></assembly>`。

trans-unit.source: These tags specify the name of the file containing the assembly manifest for the output file of the compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這些標記會指定包含編譯輸出檔的組件資訊清單的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: See [XML Comment Tags](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/recommended-xml-tags-for-documentation-comments.md) for ways to generate documentation from comments in your code.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XML 註解標記](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/recommended-xml-tags-for-documentation-comments.md)的方式來產生文件從您的程式碼中的註解。

trans-unit.source: To set /doc in the Visual Studio integrated development environment
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 中設定 /doc 整合式開發環境

trans-unit.source: 1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 1.在 **方案總管**中選取專案。

trans-unit.source: On the **Project** menu, click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: 在**專案**] 功能表上，按一下 [**屬性**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to the Project Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/898dd854-c98d-430c-ba1b-a913ce3c73d7).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/898dd854-c98d-430c-ba1b-a913ce3c73d7)。

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Compile** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2.按一下 [編譯] 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: 3. Set the value in the **Generate XML documentation file** box.
trans-unit.target: 3.在設定的值**產生 XML 文件檔案**方塊。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: See [Documenting Your Code with XML](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/documenting-your-code-with-xml.md) for a sample.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[記載您的程式碼使用 XML](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/documenting-your-code-with-xml.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic 命令列編譯器](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/index.md)

trans-unit.source: [Documenting Your Code with XML](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/documenting-your-code-with-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 XML 加入程式碼註解](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/documenting-your-code-with-xml.md)
